Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package com.plumcreektechnology.tala0_0

Interface Summary
PopUpAdapter.PopUpCallbacks an interface defined to insure that the instantiating activity has the ability to respond to these method calls
SettingsFragment.OnOffReceiver interface defined to insure that instantiating context has methods we can use to communicate with it
SliderView.SliderReceiver interface defined so we can call back to the instantiating activity
Tala_Constants interface containing constants relevant to more than one class at a time, and therefore stored in a central location
TemporaryFragment.PlaceSpecification interface built so that we can insure that the instantiating context implements methods we will use to communicate with it
 

Class Summary
Directions holds all relevant results obtained from parsing a google directions API request
DirectionsFragment a fragment that displays directions in a simple read-only scrolling DialogFragment that sits on top of whatever application is running
DirectionsQuery class for holding data to submit for a google directions api request
GeofenceReceiverService class that responds to geofence alerts probably doesn't work because Geofences are way finnicky
GetDirections an asynchronous task to get Directions from Google Directions API
GetPlacesDetails an asynchronous task to retrieve details about a location from the Place Details Google API
InfoFragment class to display the details about a specific in a scrolling read-only window that pops up on top of whatever application is running
Leg class that holds data for a "Leg" of a journey, a section between stopping points
LocationService class that manages the location client, places location requests, and keeps track of the places that we are currently in proximity to.
Place class that holds the relevant data about an individual place as returned by the Places API
PlaceDetails class that holds all of the data that would be returned from a PlaceDetails request
PlaceQuery class that contains the data needed to place a request to the Google Places API
PopUpAdapter adapter for putting rows of place data into our popup
PopUpAdapter.PopUpHolder holds the data for a popup
PopUpFragment this fragment gives you more options for learning about a point, removes the point, or is dismissed
PopUpRow class for storing data about a aplace displayed in the proximity alert popup an attempt to have a structure that would let us dynamically change the alert display
Route class to hold the "route" data as returned by the Google Directions API
SettingsFragment dynamic fragment for displaying the user preferences
SliderView customized seekbar interface for displaying a category to the user in the settings fragment with a sliding value, a unit of measurement and a checkbox for including or ommitting it from searches
Step class that contains the relevant data for a "step" of directions as returned by the Google Directions API
TalaMain the main class for the entire application starts the other services and tasks and maintains UI
TemporaryFragment this is a placeholder fragment to use when more panels are needed to test the menu and navigation
